items.name: Vegan Bacon Cheeseburger
items.clue: it says '100% vegan' on the wrapper.

items.name: Bagel with cream cheese
items.clue: has the name 'Javi' written on the wrapper.

items.name: Barlton's ancient sword
items.clue: Barlton won't be needing this anymore.

items.name: Filth Filled Boots
items.clue: Looks like someone spewed in their boots

items.name: a human ribcage
items.clue: It still has bits of person on it, but it will make a good chest plate

characters.name: Dave the Cave Explorer
characters.story: Dave decided to go searching for caves, as he loves to explore them in his free time.

characters.name: Gramantha
characters.story: Once an heiress to a whipcream empire, Gramantha turned her back on her privellage and decided to explore caves or something.

characters.name: Lil Lost Timmy
characters.story: He's little. He's lost. He's Timmy.

characters.name: Larry the Woodsman
characters.story: A large barrel chested man whos only love is the forest and his dog Juniper. He also likes caves.

characters.name: Cave Dweller
characters.story: You hear a strange sound, much like a child whimpering, or screaming. You don't really know, but it's getting closer.

characters.name: Facebat
characters.story: You hear an undeniable sound, screeching, it's definitely a facebat!

characters.name: Cave Gnome
characters.story: You feel a strange sensation on your leg, almost as if a tiny dog brushed your ankles, but then you notice a tiny human-like face, with a dumb pointy hat, Watch out! It's a cave gnome!

characters.name: Chorgoth the Cave Hippo
characters.story: The ground rumbles...It's getting closer..Is it? It can't be...It's Chorgoth the Cave Hippo. He's large and in charge! Prepare for battle!

caves.story: Walking through the forest you see a giant dark cave entrance:
As you enter the tunnel you come across a skeleton next to a backpack:
As you walk through this side of the cave you enveloped in pure darkness, all you can see is something shiny in the distance
You come across what appears to be some kind of nesting ground for an unspeakable creature.
The sound of dripping water catches your attention, but even more exciting is the sight of a strange chest halfway submerged in a shallow pool.
It stinks... really bad. The floor is sticky and mushy. You see something sticking out of this disgusting substance.
You come across a large underground waterfall, It appears to be a dead end but you feel a breeze coming from the direction of the waterfall
You find an enourmous cavern housing a pirate ship, but defiintely not like the one from the Goonies, its totally different than that.
Something is sleeping... something big, you wish you brought extra underwear.
